displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of the Job.

clientRequestId.description: Gets the client request Id used in the operation execution context.

activityId.description: Gets the activity Id used in the operation execution context.

ErrorDetails.description: Error contract returned when some exception occurs in Rest API.

possibleCauses.description: Gets the possible causes of error.

recommendedAction.description: Gets the recommended action to resolve error.

isAgentReportedError.description: Gets a value indicating whether the error originated from a agent or not.

agentErrorMessage.description: Gets the error message from the agent.

agentErrorPossibleCauses.description: Gets possible causes for the agent error.

agentErrorRecommendedAction.description: Gets the recommended action for the agent error.

numberOfProcessorCore.description: Number of Processor Cores allocated for the machine.

vmConfigurationFileLocation.description: Root location of the VM configuration file.

operatingSystemDetails.description: Operating System Details installed on the machine.

updatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp marking last updated on the machine.

instanceUuid.description: On-premise Instance UUID of the machine.

OperatingSystem.description: Second level object returned as part of Machine REST resource.

status.description:
Gets the status of the operation. ARM expects the terminal status to be one of
            Succeeded/ Failed/ Canceled. All other values imply that the operation is still running.

RunAsAccountProperties.description: Class for run as account properties.

displayName.description: Display name of the run as account.

createdTimestamp.description: Timestamp marking run as account creation.

updatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp marking last updated on the run as account.

eTag.description: Gets or sets the eTag for concurrency control.

location.description: Gets or sets the Azure location in which Sites is created.

properties.description: Gets or sets the nested properties.

servicePrincipalIdentityDetails.description:
Gets or sets the service principal identity details used by agent for communication
            to the service.

agentDetails.description: Gets or sets the on-premises agent details.

tenantId.description:
Gets or sets the tenant Id for the service principal with which the on-premise
            management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

applicationId.description:
Gets or sets the application/client Id for the service principal with which the
            on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure 
            services.

objectId.description:
Gets or sets the object Id of the service principal with which the on-premise
            management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.

audience.description: Gets or sets the intended audience for the service principal.

aadAuthority.description:
Gets or sets the AAD Authority URL which was used to request the token for the
            service principal.

rawCertData.description: Gets or sets the raw certificate data for building certificate expiry flows.

id.description: Gets the ID of the agent.

version.description: Gets the version of the agent.

lastHeartBeatUtc.description: Gets the last heartbeat time of the agent in UTC.

keyVaultUri.description: Gets or sets the key vault URI.

keyVaultId.description: Gets or sets the key vault ARM Id.

numberOfProcessorCore.description: Number of Processor Cores allocated for the machine.

vmConfigurationFileLocation.description: Root location of the VM configuration file.

operatingSystemDetails.description: Operating System Details installed on the machine.

updatedTimestamp.description: Timestamp marking last updated on the machine.

instanceUuid.description: On-premise Instance UUID of the machine.

eTag.description: Gets or sets the eTag for concurrency control.

location.description: Gets or sets the Azure location in which Sites is created.

properties.description: Gets or sets the nested properties.
